{{disambig-more: '''Tim Kirk''' is an artist who has illustrated various scenes from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s works.

Kirk's illustrations became known to Tolkien fans when they appeared in early American fanzines. A series of twenty-six paintings for ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' was done for his master's degree in illustration and some of these were published by Ballantine Books in ''[[The J.R.R.
